name: Wine & Dine at Restaurant Sieghard

organizer.name: Sieghard – Das kleine Hotel mit der großen Küche

location.name: Sieghard – Das kleine Hotel mit der großen Küche

description: Friday, 14th July 2017Wine and Dine with surprise and the white winery Josef Schmid from the Kremstal as well as the red winery Jalits from the South BurgenlandThursday, 24th August 2017Wine and Dine with magician Ben Hyven and a top wine producer from AustriaFriday, 22nd September 2017Wine and Dine with the guys of "Hokus Pokus"And the Weißweingut domain Wachau and a top red wine producer from AustriaStarts at 7 p.m.Gourmet menu incl. plenty of wine, mineral and coffee € 109, - per person
